summary: Implements the Ansible service_facts module that probes the target host, determines the active init system, and collects comprehensive details about all services—including their state, enablement, and description—across a wide range of platforms such as systemd, SysVinit, Upstart, OpenRC, AIX, FreeBSD, and OpenBSD.
business_intent: Provide Ansible playbooks with reliable service inventory data for reporting, conditional logic, and compliance verification across heterogeneous Linux/Unix environments.
